sentences.en: ...the tactical ineptitude of the allied commander.

sentences.cn: 禁不住要批评他们的笨拙.

sentences.en: Finally got the sack after a year of ineptitude.
sentences.cn: 不称职地工作一年后终于被解雇.

sentences.en: Here, I would argue, simple ineptitude seems to be a bigger problem than disinclination to co - operate.
sentences.cn: 依我见,在这个问题上,相比不愿合作的态度, 纯粹的无能似乎是更严重的问题.

sentences.en: In the book she speaks of his "social ineptitude" and says he verbally abused her.
sentences.cn: 她在书中提到他“缺乏社交技能”，并且说他曾经对她出言不逊。

sentences.en: the ineptitude of the people in charge
The problem stems from your way of thinking, not from a real ineptitude.
sentences.cn: 其实,问题是在于我们怎么去“想”的, 而不在于真的无能.

sentences.en: Well-meaning ineptitude rises to empyreal absurdity.
sentences.cn: 善意的愚蠢行为导致最大的荒唐。

words.tran_cn: 不适当，不合适；不称职；愚笨

trans.tran_cn: 不合适，不适当，笨拙，愚笨
trans.tran_en: If you refer to someone's ineptitude, you are criticizing them because they do something with a complete lack of skill
